#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main() {
    int t,s,c,ss,cc,n;
    string str;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--) {
        cin>>n;
        cin>>str;
        cc=0;s=0;ss=0;c=0;
        for(long int i=0;i<str.length();i++) {
            if(str[i]=='S') s++;
            else c++;
            //if(i%4==0) {
                if(s==4) { ss++; s=0; c=0; }
                else if(c==4) { cc++; s=0; c=0; }
            //}    
        }    
        if(s==0 and c==0) cout<<ss<<"-"<<cc<<"\n";
        else {
            cout<<ss<<"-"<<cc<<",";
            if(s==0) cout<<0<<"-";
            else if(s==1) cout<<15<<"-";
            else if(s==2) cout<<30<<"-";
            else cout<<40<<"-";
            
            if(c==0) cout<<0<<"\n";
            else if(c==1) cout<<15<<"\n";
            else if(c==2) cout<<30<<"\n";
            else cout<<40<<"\n";
        }    
    }
    //system("pause");    
    return 0;
}
